root.name: Mutant Storm Reloaded
root.description: OverviewThis typical sci-fi shooter drops you in a non existing storyline where you have to shoot your way through 89 levels of enemies before reaching the end title. As with most of these titles you get upgrades and goodies during your shoot-outs which will help you to clear the level and kill the bad bosses. The game features different difficulty levels, multiple playing modes, online leaderboards and local multiplayer options.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XP,Vista, 7Processor: Intel/AMD 1.6ghz or betterMemory: 512mb of RAMGraphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible shader 2DirectXÂ®: 9.0cHard Drive: 100 MBSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
